name: vendor-hours-tracker
description: Dashboard for tracking vendor hours against fixed monthly budget allocations

scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w client && npm run lint -w server
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w client && npm run typecheck -w server
scripts.pm2:start: mkdir -p logs && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --env production
scripts.pm2:start:dev: mkdir -p logs && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --env development

author: David Brandes
